snippet: Scott O’Neil, who stabilized the Knicks after the Isiah Thomas era, has stepped down after four years on the job.
abstract: Scott O’Neil, an energetic executive who helped stabilize the New York Knicks after the controversy and tumult of the Isiah Thomas era, has left his post as president of Madison Square Garden Sports, after only four years on the job.
lead_paragraph: Scott O’Neil, who stabilized the Knicks after the Isiah Thomas era, has stepped down after four years on the job.

headline.seo: Scott O’Neil Leaving Post as President of Madison Square Garden Sports
headline.main: President of Madison Square Garden Sports Leaving Post
headline.print_headline: President of Madison Square Garden Leaves
